column2: "Paul
column3: Jesus Kraest n’akowaa
column4: ɔsomafo a wɔafrɛ no na woeyi no esi hɔ ama Nyankopɔn n’asɛmpa a"

column2: "ɔnam no nkɔnhyɛfo no do dzii kan bɔɔ anohoba wɔ kyerɛwsɛm krɔnkrɔn no mu
column4: "wɔ ne Ba no a wɔwoo no David asenyi wɔ honam afamu no ho
column6: "na woyii no kyerɛɛ dɛ Nyankopɔn Ba wɔ tum mu
column8: ɔnam ewufo mu soɛr do; Jesus Kraest hɛn Ewuradze a
column10: "yɛnam no do enya adom nye asomafodwuma akɔ gyedzi setsie mu wɔ amanaman nyina mu

column2: "dɛm amanamamfo yi mu na hom so hom wɔ
column3: hom a Jesus Kraest afrɛ hom ayɛ nedze no."

column2: "Emi Paul yi na mekyerɛw dze kɛma Nyankopɔn n’adɔfo a wɔwɔ Rome nyina
column3: ahotseweefo a wɔafrɛ hɔn no. Adom nye asomdwee a ofi hɛn Egya Nyankopɔn nye Ewuradze Jesus Kraest hɔ nka hom."

column2: "Dza odzi kan nye dɛ menam Jesus Kraest do da me Nyankopɔn ase wɔ hom nyina ntsi
column3: osiandɛ wɔka hom gyedzi ho asɛm wɔ wiadze nyina."

column2: "Na me dasefo nye Nyankopɔn a mosom no mo sunsum mu wɔ ne Ba n’asɛmpa no mu
column3: mbrɛ minngyaa hom dzin bɔ da
column5: "na meserɛ wɔ me mpaabɔ mu daa dɛ bi a da bi Nyankopɔn pɛ a
column6: ongya me kwan pa ma membra hom nkyɛn."

column2: "Na m’enyi gyina dɛ muhu hom
column3: ma meeyi sunsum mu akyɛdze bi ama hom

column2: "ɔno nye dɛ
column3: yɛnam homankasa hom gyedzi na emi medze so do hɛn nyina eenya awerɛkyekyer wɔ hɛn mu."

column2: "Na eso
column3: enuanom
column4: memmpɛ dɛ medze besie hom dɛ mpɛn pii nye yi a mabɔ me tsirmu pɔw dɛ mebɛba hom nkyɛn (naaso woesiw me kwan ebodu sesei) ama meenya hom so hom mu aba bi

column2: "Meyɛ kafonyi ma Griikfo nye amamforafo nyina
column3: enyansafo nye adwenharfo nyina."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi na medze ndamyɛ ayɛ krado dɛ mebɛka asɛmpa no akyerɛ hom a hom wɔ Rome so."
"Na m’enyi nnto asɛmpa no ho
column3: osiandɛ ɔyɛ Nyankopɔn no tum a ɔdze kɔ nkwagye mu ma hɔn a wɔgye dzi nyina

column2: "Osiandɛ no mu na woyi Nyankopɔn tsenenee edzi
column3: ɔnam gyedzi mu kowie gyedzi mu: dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw dɛ
column4: Ɔtseneneenyi nam gyedzi do benya nkwa."

column2: "Na wofi sor ada Nyankopɔn ebufuw no edzi etsia nyimpa a wonnsuro Nyame na wɔdze brakyew nam emumuyɛ nyina do siw nokwar no kwan no;"
"na dza wohu no Nyankopɔn ho a ɔyɛ yie no da hɔ pefee wɔ hɔn mu: osiandɛ Nyankopɔn na oeyi akyerɛ hɔn."
"Na Nyankopɔn ho adze a wonnhu no
column3: ofitsi ber a wɔbɔɔ wiadze no ɔnam ndzɛmba a wɔayɛ do ada no edzi pefee
column5: mekyerɛ no tum a onnyi ewiei nye ne nyamesu no; dɛm ntsi wonnyi anoyi biara;"

column2: "osiandɛ wohun Nyankopɔn no
column3: wɔannhyɛ no enyimnyam dɛ Nyankopɔn
column4: eso wɔannda no ase; na mbom hɔn adwen yɛ nkwaseadwen
column5: na sum hyɛɛ hɔn akoma a ntseasee nnyi mu no ma."

column2: "Hɔnara wɔse wɔyɛ enyansafo no
column3: wɔdaan nkwasea
column5: "na wɔsakyeer Nyankopɔn a ɔmmprɔw n’enyimnyam yɛɛ nyimpa a ɔprɔw no honyi saso
column7: nye mbowa a wotsia ntwɛr anan

column2: "Dɛm ntsi Nyankopɔn yii hɔn maa efifidze wɔ hɔn akoma akɔndɔ mu
column3: dɛ wongu hɔn nyimpadua ho fi wɔ hɔn mu
column5: "osiandɛ wɔsesaa Nyankopɔn no nokwar no gyee ator
column6: na wɔsɔree soom abɔdze kyɛɛn Bɔadze
column7: ɔno a woehyira no daa no; Amen."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi Nyankopɔn yii hɔn maa enyimguase akɔndɔ nhyɛdo mu: na hɔn mbaa dze hɔn nyɛbea a ɔsɛ hɔn suban sesae gyee dza otsia hɔn suban;"
"dɛmara so na hɔn mbarimba so gyaa dɛ wɔnye ɔbaa hyia dɛ mbrɛ ɔsɛ na ɔfata hɔn suban
column3: na mbom wonyaa akɔndɔ wɔ hɔnho nkorkor
column5: ntsi so wonyaa akatua a ɔfata hɔn mfom wɔ hɔnankasa hɔn mu."

column2: "Na dɛ mbrɛ woemmbu no bi dɛ wɔbɔkora Nyankopɔn wɔ hɔn nyimdzee mu no
column3: Nyankopɔn so gyaa hɔn maa adwen a ɔmmfora

column2: "Brakyew nyina hyɛɛ hɔn ma
column3: emumuyɛ

column2: "wɔyɛ asotufo
column3: anokumfo

column2: "hɔn na wonyim Nyankopɔn ahyɛdze
column3: dɛ hɔn a wɔyɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yi fata owu
column4: naaso nnyɛ ne yɛ nko na wɔyɛ
column5: na mpo wɔgye hɔn a wɔyɛ dɛm ndzɛmba no so to mu."
